item.description:
CENTRAL CT SINGLES INVITES US:

Celebrate Valentines With Hundreds Of Local Singles at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility


Dance the night away -meet some special and party with Central CT Singles

Music from DJ Johnny and Prizes

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108

I-84 t0 Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)

(860) 289-2704

The Party starts at 8 pm

Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

SAVE MONEY - Tickets are only $15

ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $20 until Thursday Feb 12 CLICK HERE


Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com

http://centralctsingl...

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
